page.title: 06RELIGION
page.content:
Reverend Thomas is rector of St Mary's C.E. Church in Thornton Watlass. He is also rector of two other churches, at Thornton Steward and East Witton, both to the west of our area.
The upkeep of the Church is the responsibility of the local community. To raise the Â£5,000 necessary, the villages organize fund-raising events. The most popular of these are the Garden Fete and the Barn dance held each Summer.
About 75% of the villagers belong to the Church of England. A small percentage of the remainder belong to the Methodist and Roman Catholic Churches.
